law.catch_line: Children of illegal or void marriages considered as if born in lawful wedlock.
law.text: The issue of all illegal or void marriages is considered as if born in lawful wedlock.
law.history: Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 49, sec. 5. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2098.
